Rooam | Senior Software Enginer, Java, Groovy | Washington DC | Contract | REMOTE | rooam.co

We are looking for remote experienced software engineers in designing and operating distributed JVM based web applications.

Responsibilities: * Develop backend web applications using Groovy, Spring Boot, RabbitMQ and MongoDB * Apply best practices into design and implementation of scalable and distributed JVM applications using REST API, Message Queues and NoSQL databases * Cooperate with other team members (e.g. backend, mobile and QA) * Review git pull requests of other team members * Be part of daily stand-ups * Kanban

Requirements/Skills/Conditions: * 5+ years of experience with JVM tech stack * This is a long term direct contract (No agencies please) * Company does not sponsor visas or relocation at the moment * Good written and spoken English * Responsible and team player

Hiring process: * CV is received and reviewed * Initial Phone/Skype call * 1st round technical interview * Technical assignment * 2nd round technical interview * Decision

Please send your resume to `remote-dev at rooam.co`

Thank you.
